title.narrative: Promotion of alternative models of environmental management in Chisec in the context of COVID-19

description.narrative: Following the work done with project GUA181 which will finish in May 2021, the Guatemalan CAFOD church partner Pastoral Social - Caritas, Diocese of Verapaz, will continue the work with a new project called "Promotion of alternative models of environmental management for the protection of natural resources and strengthening of livelihoods for the economic reactivation and integral care of 10 indigenous and rural communities of Chisec, Alta Verapaz, affected by the tropical depressions ETA and IOTA in the framework of the Covid-19 pandemic". The goal is to contribute to the human development of women and men in 10 rural and indigenous Mayan Q'eqchi communities in the municipality of Chisec, Alta Verapaz, strengthening their resilience through the adequate management of natural resources, livelihoods, protection and recovery of agro-biodiversity, adaptation to climate change and valuing local and cultural knowledge, from a gender, intergenerational and intercultural perspective. The project is intended for two years. So far we are able to support with funds for the first seven months, June-December 2021. See GUA181 for previous work.

participating-org.narrative: Pastoral Social - Caritas, Diocesis de la Verapaz
